title: Process In-Store Return with Receipt
description: A customer wants to return an item they bought last week and has the original receipt.

tasks.description: Scan the barcode on the customer's receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: The POS system retrieves the original transaction details.

tasks.description: Scan the item being returned and visually inspect it to ensure it is in returnable condition.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the item was on the original transaction, and the associate verifies its condition.

tasks.description: Process the return, issuing a refund to the customer's original form of payment (e.g., credit card).
tasks.expected_outcome: The return is completed, and the refund is successfully processed.
